title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.J.Res. 111 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
November 1, 2017
On Wednesday, November 1, 2017, the President signed into law:H.J.Res. 111, which nullifies the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau’s rule prohibiting the use of a pre-dispute arbitration agreement to prevent a consumer from filing or participating in certain class action suits.
